::The Galactors::

"Galactors, there's something up ahead. Its giving off a very weak 
energy signature."

The Galactors were flying through the area in which the Alliance base 
used to be. The leftovers of Alliance occupation were below them. 
There were burned out areas in which remains of bots and ships lay 
where they had fallen. Trees were charred on a major scale, and there 
were barely any animals inhabiting them. But one of the scrap heaps 
still gave off an energy signature.

Supernova, who had sent the message to all the other Galactors, lands 
near the scrapped body of an old Alliance bot. The knowledge had been 
programmed into him, so he immediately knew who he was. The other 
Galactors landed around him.

"Weird how Wolfgang would survive scrapped like this for so long," 
Scrap, who also knew who the bot was, says, "Lets get him back to base 
and see what Zardus wants done with him."

The Galactors pick up pieces of Wolfgang, flying off ba
